person.bio: Joining ThreeFold as a small farmer, Hannah has been part of the ThreeFold ecosystem for a few years. Recently, she’s joined ThreeFold’s promotion and communications team, where she’s mainly responsible for content creation and public relations. While studying International Management (B.Sc.) and International Business (M.A.) with a focus on Marketing Management in Germany, Canada, and Spain, Hannah has gathered professional experience in public relations, promotion, and event management in industries, such as aviation, lighting solutions, and FMCG. As an open-minded and curious individual, Hannah believes in lifelong learning and deeply appreciates the ThreeFold ecosystem for coming together from diverse backgrounds, bringing in different perspectives, and sharing the same values. She has a strong passion for everything related to sustainability, branding, and technology.
person.excerpt: Strongly passioned for everything related to sustainability, branding, and technology.

node.title: Bridges Connecting the ThreeFold Ecosystem to External Networks
node.excerpt: Since the launch of ThreeFold Grid 3.0, TFT is now available on three blockchains – Stellar, Binance Smart Chain and the Substrate-based ThreeFold Blockchain (aka TF Chain).

node.title: Building the Future We Want to Live In – A Four Step Journey
node.excerpt: Driven by our planet-first, people-first philosophy, the ThreeFold movement is shaping the world we want to live in and laying the foundation for an open, inclusive and abundance-based future.

node.title: The Internet is Moving to the Edge
node.excerpt: With emerging technologies like IoT, Web 3 and more, computing needs to be pushed from centralized data centers to the edge of the network. Learn why ThreeFold is the ideal foundation for a thriving interconnected future.

node.title: Farming – A Greener Alternative to Crypto Mining
node.excerpt: ThreeFold Farming is about so much more than crypto mining. It's a decentralized, energy-efficient and meaningful alternative.

node.title: The Internet that connects us also manipulates us. In search of a better future.
node.excerpt: The Internet as we know it was once free and decentralized by nature. Over time, the Internet lost its neutrality. ThreeFold represents an opportunity to realize the initial promise of a distributed and neutral Internet owned by the people.

node.title: How to stop the Internet from Gobbling the World’s Energy
node.excerpt: Oftentimes, the Internet’s significant energy consumption and climate impacts go unnoticed. At ThreeFold, we're leading the way by working on energy-efficient and sustainable solutions for the Internet.

node.title: Planting the Seeds: ThreeFold's Plans to Regenerate the Planet
node.excerpt: We believe our planet needs regenerative solutions at a large scale. ThreeFold and Take Action Global (TAG) are on a mission to regenerate the planet together.

node.title: A Journey through the Decentralization and Blockchain Space – Part Two: Akash
node.excerpt: This post is the second one in a series to explore fellow projects and their solutions with regards to what they share with ThreeFold but also where we differ. Follow me on my journey through the space. This time, we're looking into Akash!

node.title: A Journey through the Decentralization and Blockchain Space – Part One: Dfinity
node.excerpt: This post is the first one in a series to explore fellow projects and their solutions with regards to what they share with ThreeFold but also where we differ. Follow me on my journey through the space. First up – Dfinity!

node.title: A Journey through the Decentralization and Blockchain Space – Part Four: Storj
node.excerpt: Follow me to the fourth stop on my journey through the space. This time, we’re looking into Storj!

node.title: A Journey through the Decentralization and Blockchain Space – Part Three: Filecoin
node.excerpt: This post is the third one in a series to look into fellow projects and their solutions to better understand the space we operate in and how ThreeFold stands out. This time, we're taking a closer look at Filecoin!

node.title: Our Quest to Fully Decentralize the Internet
node.excerpt: It's our mission to transform the Internet and Cloud. Learn more about the status quo and how we're working on fully decentralizing the entire Internet!

node.title: Stake TFT and Become a ThreeFold Validator
node.excerpt: ThreeFold is realizing the initial promise of an open-source, peer-to-peer Internet owned by the people. Anyone can become a validator and participate in the decentralization of the Internet economy.

node.title: The ThreeFold Blockchain
node.excerpt: The third release of the ThreeFold Grid represents a major step in the decentralization of the People’s Internet with the Smart Contract for IT coming to life on the ThreeFold Blockchain (aka “TF Chain”).

node.title: The ThreeFold Grid 3.x Explorer UI
node.excerpt: The Explorer was designed to provide a simple way for anyone to find decentralized Internet capacity on the ThreeFold Grid, and we’re thrilled to announce a new user interface for Grid 3.x on both testnet and devnet!

node.title: Why is ThreeFold P2P Cloud the better solution for customers than Amazon Web Services or Microsoft Azure?
node.excerpt: As we’ve recently been exploring decentralized projects to see where ThreeFold is in the space and where we stand out, we thought it’s a good time to also look into how we compare to traditional, centralized cloud providers.

node.title: ThreeFold at Consensus: A Decentralized World is in Our Hands
node.excerpt: It’s that time of the year when believers and builders of a decentralized tomorrow gather to celebrate the festival for the decentralized world. And ThreeFold is the foundation to realize a truly decentralized world.

node.title: ThreeFold Weekly! June 15th, 2022 (Vol 21)
node.excerpt: Welcome to the 21st edition of ThreeFold Weekly. It’s been a big week! Let’s take a quick look at the latest happenings within the ThreeFold universe.
